short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color wheel, color picker and palette generator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Delve into the world of colors with Coloora! This extension showcases the intricate relationships between colors in any image you input, displayed on a dynamic color wheel. Perfect for artists, designers, or anyone passionate about understanding color dynamics in their visuals.

Create automatic palette generation and a custom color palette creator, complete with an eyedropper tool for precise color picking.
